remarks: Lemma for ~ hashf1 .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Apr-2015.)
statement:
hashf1lem2.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
hashf1lem2.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. Fin ) $.
hashf1lem2.3 $e |- ( ph -> -. z e. A ) $.
hashf1lem2.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( ( # ` A ) + 1 ) <_ ( # ` B ) ) $.
hashf1lem1.5 $e |- ( ph -> F : A -1-1-> B ) $.
hashf1lem1 $p |- ( ph -> { f | ( ( f |` A ) = F /\ f : ( A u. { z } ) -1-1-> B ) } ~~ ( B \ ran F ) ) $.
$d A f $.
$d B f $.
$d F f $.
$d f ph $.
$d f z $.
